name: ItalianguidedmeditationsinLAAV
0:
”Alexa, open italian guided meditations”
”Alexa, ask italian guided meditations for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start italian guided meditations”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: italian guided meditations
des:
Listen to the latest tracks in Italian language from Italian spiritual researcher Gabriella Tuninetti. 

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. 

You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". 

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

**Very important**: do not listen to meditations while driving or operating machinery. Only when you're safe and can relax, without any risk or danger for yourself or other people.

The information provided by the skill is for informational and educational purposes only. In no way the author wanted to give health or medical advices.

(Message in Italian): Gabriella Tuninetti ti dà il benvenuto. Stai per ascoltare meditazioni guidate, mantra e percorsi di Radio Sentiero LAAV, la radio che parla alla tua anima. Gabriella è ricercatrice spirituale e autrice dei libri Un Sentiero per l'Anima e Alla Ricerca dell'Anima. Cura il sito https://www.sentierolaav.it.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
